text: Pas ej Rasul, xud va pajravoni tu ruji xudro ʙa haqgaroi va ixlos ʙa sui din ʙigardoned. Va hamesa pojdor ʙos ʙar in dini islom, ki in fitrati ilohi ast, ki Alloh taolo mardumro ʙar on ofaridaast. Digarguni dar ofarinisi Alloh nest. In ast dini ustuvor, ki ʙa rohi mustaqim va ʙa sui xusnudii Parvardigori cahonijon va cannati U roh menamojad, vale aksari mardum in haqiqatro namedonand, ki dini haq Islom ast, na digar dinho
